title: Maria Grazia Chiuri on Her Female Perspective at Dior | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Maria Grazia Chiuri on Her Female Perspective at Dior | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: Ahead of the opening of the UK’s largest retrospective on Christian Dior, Chiuri talks about the importance of couture and her perspective as the first female creative director of the house.Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.l
description:
Ahead of the opening of the UK’s largest retrospective on Christian Dior, Chiuri talks about the importance of couture and her perspective as the first female creative director of the house.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
